explains: adj. 发狂的；心烦意乱的

sentences.en: I became a distraught, worried mother, a useless role if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 如果有个心烦意乱、忧心忡忡的母亲，一个完全无用的角色，那就是我。

sentences.en: I was distraught and let out a bellow of tearful rage.
sentences.cn: 我心烦意乱，发出了一声悲愤的吼叫。

sentences.en: Mr. Barker's distraught parents were last night being comforted by relatives.
sentences.cn: 巴克先生烦躁不安的父母昨晚被亲戚们安抚了。
